summary: Ryanair is an Irish airline company based in Dublin. It's a big group with several airlines under its wing, the oldest being Ryanair DAC, which started in 1984. The company grew quickly after 1997 when the European aviation industry changed its rules. Now, it operates over 500 planes, flying to more than 40 countries. Ryanair is Ireland's largest airline and once was the world's busiest by international passengers. However, it has faced criticism for its business practices, including extra charges and poor customer service.
title: Ryanair
